channel.title: Black Mesa Introduction
channel.description: Ok, this was discussed in the 'ask the developers' thread and so in attempts to refrain from spamming that thread up, I made this one. Basically the discussion was about an intro movie (like Valve has in all of their games -- ie. the movie with the valve in the guy's head) for Black Mesa. Here's my latest concept: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UYsTvZNPfs0&hd=1[/url] I made this in Adobe Flash and After Effects.

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Their reaction has been this thread. So nothing

But I do like all these ideas guys. Resonance cascade… here we come!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
Excellent job, but I agree with the others - it sounds a bit too cliched horror for me. I would suggest a grittier alternative - instead of rain falling, have dust or sand, something dry and dirty.
Either that or go with the Valve route - making it seem as though it’s on a film reel with a simple but ominous soundtrack over the top.

Is this something you’re just offering to them? If so, what has their reaction been, if any?

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
This logo could be introducing the team that made Black Mesa, too. They are just called the ‘Black Mesa devs’, after all.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: TicTacToe
item.description:
Good job Dillxn, you really captured the essence of Half Life and Black Mesa: shit flying around. Wait, no, that’s explosive diarrhea.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
The movie with the valve-headed dude is introducing the studio, it’s not a title screen. I imagine the BM title screen will be done like HL2, with a 3d background. In other words I don’t see much point in making an animated BM title/logo.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Garcian_Smith
item.description:
Hm. The lightning effects are a little too… Hammer Horror-esque for my liking and the shakiness is still quite erratic.

Still looks neat, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Here’s a high(er) def version: https://www.Dillxn.com/bm/Black%20Mesa%20Intro.mpg
I advise watching it full-screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
I would’ve removed the mesa-logo and just use the text + the ² (with an s) bit.

Mainly because it looks awful when stretched.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Assassin
item.description:
I think that it would be cool if BM logo will be “teleported” on the screen

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
I think resonance cascade effects would be better fitting than thunder and rain. And green flashes instead of lightning flashes.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
While I like your idea of an intro movie, this one just seems too nautical.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
sanchezinc:

Like the rain and sound, but the logo doesn’t seem to be well focused, don’t know if it was caused because of the shakes. As for the start and end maybe add a fade out/in? Good job anyway keep it up. Hopefully they will use it. Or get inspired by it.

The logo isn’t focused because of the youtube compression. I can indeed do a fade in / out on the start and end. And thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: sanchezinc
item.description:
Like the rain and sound, but the logo doesn’t seem to be well focused, don’t know if it was caused because of the shakes. As for the start and end maybe add a fade out/in? Good job anyway keep it up. Hopefully they will use it. Or get inspired by it.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Introduction
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Ok, this was discussed in the ‘ask the developers’ thread and so in attempts to refrain from spamming that thread up, I made this one.
Basically the discussion was about an intro movie (like Valve has in all of their games – ie. the movie with the valve in the guy’s head) for Black Mesa.
Here’s my latest concept:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UYsTvZNPfs0&hd=1
I made this in Adobe Flash and After Effects.

Read full topic
